title: I Want to Express My Feelings!
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Hanamaru-san...... we’ve arrived at our destination!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Whoa...... this bookstore is enormous...... Maru can feel the big city energy, zura~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Let’s head inside. We’ll be able to make our dreams come true on the ninth floor!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Yeah! The book signing for one of our favorite authors is there!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I’m a bit nervous......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru too......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>When it’s my turn to meet them and get my book signed, I want to express all my feelings, but look, there’s way too much that I want to say......<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Wow, that’s a long note, zura...... Setsuna-san, how about only saying this part? Perhaps this is what you want to say the most?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>How did you know!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0107/>Maru feels the same way. Let’s go, zura~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
